entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in outlying areas early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
